logo_width.label: Desktop logo width
logo_width.info: Logo width is automatically optimized for mobile.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

items_per_page.label: Items per page
items_per_page.info: The number of items to display per page.

infinite_scroll.label: infinite scroll
infinite_scroll.info: Toggle to enable infinite scrolling on the blog page.

lazy_load.label: Lazy load images
lazy_load.info: Toggle to enable lazy loading for images.

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Toggle to enable filtering on the blog page.

enable_sorting.label: Enable sorting
enable_sorting.info: Toggle to enable sorting on the blog page.

image.label: Image
image.info: The image to display on the password page.

product_limit.label: Product limit
product_limit.info: The number of products to display.

inventory_threshold.label: Inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: The inventory threshold to display the low stock message.

show_inventory_quantity.label: Show inventory quantity
show_inventory_quantity.info: Toggle to display the inventory quantity.

page.label: Page
page.info: The page to display in the tab.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Toggle to display the dynamic checkout button.

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show gift card recipient
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Toggle to display the gift card recipient field.

paragraph.content: The product card is used to display products on the collection page. You can customize the layout of the card by toggling the options below.

show_vendor.label: Show vendor
show_vendor.info: Toggle to display or hide the vendor information on product cards.

show_price.label: Show price
show_price.info: Toggle to display or hide the price information on product cards.

show_secondary_image.label: Show secondary image
show_secondary_image.info: Toggle to display or hide the secondary image on product cards.

show_badges.label: Show badges
show_badges.info: Toggle to display or hide any badges associated with the product.

paragraph.content: The article card is used to display blog posts on the blog page. You can customize the layout of the card by toggling the options below.

show_author.label: Show author
show_author.info: Toggle to display or hide the author information on blog posts.

show_image.label: Show image
show_image.info: Toggle to display or hide the featured image on blog posts.

show_excerpt.label: Show excerpt
show_excerpt.info: Toggle to display or hide the excerpt of the blog posts.

show_date.label: Show date
show_date.info: Toggle to display or hide the publication date of the blog posts.

show_badge.label: Show badge
show_badge.info: Toggle to display or hide any badges associated with the blog posts.

show_comments.label: Show comments
show_comments.info: Toggle to display or hide comments section on blog posts.

show_tags.label: Show tags
show_tags.info: Toggle to display or hide tags on blog posts.

content.label: Content
content.info: The content to display in the announcement bar.
